import Soundcloud from "@site/src/components/soundcloud";
import { podcasts } from "@site/src/components/podcasts";

## Soundcloud Templates

```
./website/src/components/soundcloud.js
```

```
import React from "react";

export default function Soundcloud ({ scsrc }){
    return(
        <iframe
        width="100%"
        height="166"
        scrolling="no"
        frameborder="no"
        allow="autoplay"
        src={scsrc}
        ></iframe>
    );
}
```

```
.website/src/components/podcasts.js
```

```
import React from 'react';

export const podcasts = {
    "podcast1" : "https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/1244739151&color=%23ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&show_teaser=true",
    "podcast2" : "https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/1237986250&color=%23ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&show_teaser=true",
    "podcast3" : "https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/1231124572&color=%23ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&show_teaser=true"
};


```

### Soundcloud Template 1

```
<Soundcloud scsrc={podcasts.podcast1} />
<Soundcloud scsrc={podcasts.podcast2} />
<Soundcloud scsrc={podcasts.podcast3} />
```
